title: Particle moves in uniform magnetic field

content.question: A positively charged particle moves with velocity v in the positive x-direction in a uniform magnetic field B directed in the positive y-direction, as shown above. The particle experiences a force in what direction?

choices.label: Perpendicularly out of the plane of the page
Perpendicularly into the plane of the page

content.answer: Perpendicularly out of the plane of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
